72void furi_hal_switch(void* address) {
73 __set_BASEPRI(0);
74 asm volatile("ldr r3, [%0] \n"
75 "msr msp, r3 \n"
76 "ldr r3, [%1] \n"
77 "mov pc, r3 \n"
78 :
79 : "r"(address), "r"(address + 0x4)
80 : "r3");
81}
